response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and aspirations, is priced at $950,000. My aim is to ensure that we reach a mutually beneficial agreement that respects both the intrinsic worth of the product and your financial capacity. I look forward to discussing this further and exploring how we can make this transaction a reality.", "product_price": 950000}
